TopicTitle: Increase the ceiling height of VAB

Articles.Content:
Hello Community!

I'm in the planning phase of a large space station in LKO. I plan to use close (1:1) replicas of SpaceX's Falcon 9 (for crew transport aboard DragonRider) and Falcon Heavy (for boosting the modules into orbit).

DragonRider, Launched by Falcon 9 has been launched for several test flight and is a great craft!

But I have a problem constructing Falcon Heavy: Ceiling Height of the Vehicle Assembly Building.

Is there a mod to increase it? I've seen constructions like the Jool V rocket, which are much longer than my Falcon Heavy, so there must be a way, right?

Thanks in advance

Steffen
